title: Our Classic 2 Bedroom Floorplan Available Right Now!!
posting_body: ['Welcome Home to Flats at 1500', 'Welcome home to a comfortable community with beautiful apartment homes for rent in Conyers, GA.', "At Flats at 1500, we're excited to offer one-, two-, and three-bedroom floor plans.", "Take advantage of large closets, a patio or balcony, and additional storage space — but that's not all!", 'Some of our community amenities include a swimming pool with sundeck, laundry facilities, and a playground.', "Curious about what's nearby the community?", "You'll find that Flats at 1500 is minutes away from I-20, providing direct access to major employers, universities, and downtown Atlanta.", 'Schedule a tour today to see your new home in Conyers, GA.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 103', 'OR Text', '103', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact our leasing team.', 'Interested In This Unit?', 'Use this link for more details:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1032 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Patio/Balcony', '- Satellite', '- Additional Storage', '- Dishwasher', '- Refrigerator', '- View', '- Large Closets', '- Cable Ready', '- Electric', '- Microwave*', '- Private Patio/Balcony', '- Carpeting', '- Wood-Style Flooring*', '- Window Coverings', 'Community Amenities', '- Pool', '- Sundeck', '- Laundry Facilities', '- Clubhouse', '- Lush Landscaping', '- On-Site Maintenance', '- Playground', '- Off Street Parking', '- On-Site Management', 'Pet Policy', 'Pets Welcome!', 'Non-aggressive breeds accepted.', 'Weight Restrictions may apply.', 'Please see the office for fees & other details!', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-5:30PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-4:00PM', 'Flats at 1500', '1500 Brandon Glen Way NE, Conyers, GA, 30012', 'Caw8MPM1']
